entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BatchFixAllProvider crashes with "An element with the same key but a different value already exists" #57660
  • Missing test case for conditional access in `CheckValEscape` #57653
    Backlog
  • Can't Declare an Inferred Lambda With Optional Arguments #57652
  • Static fields of type pointer cannot be viewed in the Watch window #57651
  • IDE0059 Unnecessary assignment of a value to => CS0165 Use of unassigned local variable #57650
  • Roslyn fails to verify [NotNullWhen] contracts in methods returning Nullable<bool> #57649
    17.1
  • Visual Studio 2022 EnforceCodeStyleInBuild causes error to show twice #57647
    17.1
  • Intellisense not auto complete when writing code continously without enter #57646
  • `dotnet_sort_system_directives_first` does not generate error even if `IDE0055` severity is set to `error` #57644
  • Create new class is not being offered #57642

Closed

  • .NET 6.100 The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties breaking change #57627
    17.1.P2
  • Windows Defender false positive causes CI failures #49519
    Next
  • Roslyn fails to process conditional flow annotations if there's explicit true / false comparison #42398
  • C# compiler, VS: Incorrect error "Operator '?' cannot be applied to operand of type 'TValue'" #57629
    17.1
  • Test process crash on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures.UnitTests.dll #55639
    17.1
  • Compiler cannot properly detect initialization of non-nullable fields with non-null values during object initialization #57645
  • NormalizeWhitespace() does not indent switch expression syntax properly #45651
    Compiler.Next
  • Feedback for new global usings feature #57599
    17.1
  • IOperation support for interpolated string handler conversions #54718
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a baseline to Inheritance Margin benchmark #57659
    Area-IDE
  • Remove CWT from skeleton caching and simplify impl #57658
    Area-IDE
  • use pair-wise testing on PR validation #57657
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix issues in compilation tracker reported in prior PR #57656
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup how we create skeleton assemblies. #57655
    Area-IDE
  • Document that MyTaskMethodBuilder must be public #57654
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix race condition in computing _hostAnalyzerStateMap #57648
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.0
  • Avoid concurrent use of ConditionalWeakTable on net472 #57643
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Compare arrow expression clauses when they are children of properties or indexers #57624
    Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57641
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve error reporting around conditional access. #57640
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • proposed document pull diagnostics implementation #57518
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Overload resolution was ignoring HasTypeArgumentInferredFromFunctionType for calls in expanded form #57633
    Area-Compilers, 17.1.P2
  • Fix line delta calculation for top-level code #57556
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Telemetry improvements #57406
    Area-Interactive, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • adding draft of detailed spec #57346
    Area-IDE
  • Move hte dependent checksum computation directly into the CompilationTracker component #57632
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Bump dependencies and version for GA #57573
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Tiny simplification to the compilation tracker. #57628
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57661
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.7-vs-deps #57504
    Area-Infrastructure
  • reduce number of test legs we have to match a pairwise test approach #57586
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't throw when delay is expedited in tests #57631
    Area-IDE
  • Move the task completion source for a queue item into the queue item itself. #57617
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.9-vs-deps #57508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Slice value is always assumed to be not null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building #57637
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.11-vs-deps #57482
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Document why we have -vs-deps branches #41153
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix C# language name in spec #57427
    Area-Compilers
  • Port BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences to the new test framework #57626
    Area-IDE
